def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Erp.Web") from Benner.Erp.Web import AuthorizationHelper
widget.View.Commands["DELETE"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("EXCLUIR_PLANOS_DEPRECIACAO") widget.View.Commands["EDIT"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTER_PLANOS_DEPRECIACAO") widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTER_PLANOS_DEPRECIACAO")
widget.View.Commands["CMD_COPIAR"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTER_PLANOS_DEPRECIACAO")
